name: MD Watalappam Pudding Mix
description: Watalappan made at home always tastes better when made with a quality mix. Sugar, Corn Starch, Sea Weed Extract, Whey Powder, Nature Identical Egg flavour, Nutmeg powder and permitted colours (E 102, E 124, E 133) and a sachet of kithul treacle. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
